summary: A documentary on Henry Darger, visionary artist, janitor, and novelist.
cast: Larry Pine|Dakota Fanning|Frier McCollister|Wally Wingert|Janice Hong|Ruby McCollister|Paul Robert Langdon|Mary O'Donnell|Kiyoko Lerner|Mary Rooney|David Berglund|Regina Waters|Mark Waters|Henry Darger
title: In the Realms of the Unreal
